segments.text: Excuse me , which one is of the highest quality here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one . It is of the best quality and excellently tailored as well . You may try it on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is nice . But I don't quite like the collar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The collar ? It is just the collar that is popular with young people in Shanghai .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't care what others wear . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Too expensive . I don't think I can afford it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , anyway , let me have it .
segments.speaker: S1
